revised_title: Review of "The Rise of Scientific Europe, 1500-1800"
tldr: This book review discusses "The Rise of Scientific Europe, 1500-1800," a comprehensive history of scientific development in Europe. The review praises the book's original concept, depth of analysis, and wealth of information, while also noting some omissions and inconsistencies. The book covers the development of science and its institutions in various countries, with a focus on England and France in the 17th century.
